Uses of Interface
org.gvsig.topology.IRuleWithClusterTolerance

Packages that use IRuleWithClusterTolerance
org.gvsig.topology.topologyrules   
 

Uses of IRuleWithClusterTolerance in org.gvsig.topology.topologyrules
 

Classes in org.gvsig.topology.topologyrules that implement IRuleWithClusterTolerance
 class FMapGeometryMustBeClosed
          This rule checks that a fmap geometry is closed.
 class JtsValidRule
          Any validated geometry must be a right JTS geometry.
 class LineMustNotHaveDangles
          All end points of a line must touch at least another line.
 class LineMustNotHaveDangles2
           
 class LineMustNotHavePseudonodes
          This rule checks that lines of a line layer dont have pseudonodes ends (a point that touchs one only another line).
 class LineMustNotSelfIntersect
          Lines of a layer must not have self intersections.
 class LyrMustBeEqual
          All geometries of origin layer must have at least one geometry of destination layer with the same geometry.
 class LyrMustNotHaveDuplicated
           
 class MustBeLargerThanClusterTolerance
          For lines o polygons.
 class PointsMustNotOverlap
          These rule checks that in a point layer there won't be points at a distance lower than the cluster tolerance.
 class PolygonMustNotHaveGaps
           
 class PolygonMustNotHaveGapsWithJCS
          All polygons of a vectorial layer must form a continuous surface, without voids or gaps.
 class PolygonMustNotOverlap
          The polygons of a given layer must not overlaps each other (their intersection must be a line or a point, not an area)
 class PolygonMustNotOverlapWith
          Topololy rule that checks than polygon geometries of origin layer doesnt checks with polygon geometries of destination layer.
 class PolygonMustNotSelfIntersect
          The polygons of a layer must not have self intersections
